item.title: How a U.S. government shutdown could impact your benefits and services
item.description: The U.S. government could face a shutdown at 12:01 a.m. on Saturday, December 21. Here's what could be impacted.

item.title: Liquid-burning firepits behind 2 deaths, dozens of injuries, fed agency warn
item.description: Products sold as tabletop firepits, firepots, miniature fireplaces or portable fires for indoor use are "extremely dangerous," consumer agency warns.

item.title: HELOC or home equity loan: Which will be better in 2025?
